Rules._comment: Finds 6 consecutive digits, breaks them into 3 sets of 2, and reformats them as a more readable date
Finds a date of YYYY.MM.DD and changes to YYYY-MM-DD
Finds a date of YYYY.xx.xx and changes to YYYY-xx-xx (or 'XX', it's case insensitive)
Finds a capital letter immediately preceded by a lower-case, and inserts a space ('FooBar' -> 'Foo Bar')
